attributes.action: For the Mayor of London to scrap all LTNs
attributes.additional_details: Because of the mayor of London I scraped my diesel vehicle and invested in an electric vehicle but now have inconveniently had to pay five times the price of a parking permit not to mention every road accessible to my home is either a no entry or a LTN. All the mayor is doing is making up for the money he loss during lockdown and looking for any which way to skim money from tax payers with nonsense about global warming we have had global warming since I was a toddler
attributes.background: For all London borough councils to scrap LTNs with immediate effect seeing as we have given cyclists and TFL buses the lanes to keep them safe and buses to run as scheduled

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Low Traffic Neighbourhoods in London are individual London boroughs, Transport for London, the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Remove local authority powers to introduce LTNs, CAZs, LEZs and ULEZs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/637517
